seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, no years experience specified, but requires Master's degree and Tableau/SQL/Hive skills which suggest mid-level competence

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' with heavy emphasis on Tableau dashboards, SQL, and translating business requirements to technical solutions

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on Tableau dashboards, SQL, Oracle, Hive suggests batch reporting and ETL work rather than streaming or real-time systems

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing teams, mentoring, or technical leadership responsibilities; focus is on feature development and debugging

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP) mentioned in job description or Pass 1 extraction

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on Tableau dashboards, SQL, Hive, and Oracle suggests batch processing for reporting rather than real-time streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, dbt, Dagster, etc.) mentioned in job description or Pass 1 extraction

storage_layer.evidence: Oracle and Hive mentioned, which are typically used for data warehousing; no lake or lakehouse technologies referenced

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model, indicating regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (Pune, Maharashtra) with no mention of global or multi-timezone teams

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, Maharashtra, India implies relocation may be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: Location is Pune, India (not US) and no visa sponsorship mentioned; H1B is a US visa

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location is Pune, India; OPT/CPT are US student visa categories not applicable here

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies local work authorization required; no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position in India typically implies local employment contract (equivalent to W2)

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in Pass 1 extraction or job description

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'limitless career path' and 'make a global impact' but no specific tracks or promotion criteria

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'work in IBM Consulting Client Innovation Centers' and 'collaborating' which implies working with experienced team members

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in job description or Pass 1 extraction

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills (Tableau, SQL, Oracle, Hive) and soft skills (Communication, Project Management) with no nice-to-haves listed, suggesting moderate strictness

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on BI/data engineering with specific tools (Tableau, SQL, Hive) and responsibilities (feature development, debugging, dashboard creation)

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (Tableau, SQL, Hive, Oracle) are reasonable for a mid-level BI/data engineer role; no unrealistic combinations or senior requirements for junior role
